Subject: Urgent Action Required: Suspicious Login Attempt Detected

Dear Valued Customer,

We have detected a suspicious login attempt on your Microsoft account. Our security system has flagged this activity as potentially harmful and we urge you to take immediate action to secure your account.

The login attempt was made from an unknown device in a location that is not associated with your usual login patterns. This could indicate that someone has gained unauthorized access to your account. To prevent any further unauthorized activity, we kindly ask you to confirm whether this login attempt was made by you or if it was done by someone else.

To confirm or deny this login attempt, please click on the link below and follow the instructions provided. By confirming your login activity, you will help us protect your account and ensure the security of your personal information.

[Confirm Login Attempt]

Please note that failure to confirm this login attempt within the next 24 hours may result in the temporary suspension of your account to prevent any potential security breaches.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter. We take the security of our customers' accounts very seriously and appreciate your cooperation in resolving this issue.

Sincerely,

Microsoft Security Team
